name: Little Monkey Warrior: Alien Invasion
description:
Story: The planet is going to have all its lively materials taken away by alien robots that want to leave the earth lifeless. Little Monkey Warrior is sent to save world and destroy all the robots and have the aliens to leave earth alone.

Download this really cool and fun PC game that contains animated cutscenes and a sample level. The time limit of 2:30 minutes on the level.

Check Out My Deviant Art where I keep all of my artwork including 3D models, animations and digital paintings

Requirements: A high powered GPU or up to date.
